name: places/ChIJra13dJVYwokR-Lfc8EJX6Js
adrFormatAddress: 1060 5th Ave, New York, NY 10128-0104, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. DiGregorio ugh! she is amazing! I can't say enough how amazing she is. she is knowledgeable, extremely thorough, she actually cares and she takes her time to speak with you to make sure that you are comfortable and understand everything that she is explaining. She doesn't rush you out of the office and you don't feel as though she is trying to move you along.  She actually cares about your health and well-being and goes out of her way to make sure that all is well with you.
I have had instances when I called and it was her day off and she was not in the  office she  made sure to give me a call  and in addition to how professional she is, she always has a positive attitude and a smile for everyone.  If you bring a health concern to her, you better believe that she will do all the tests to get to the bottom and find a solution for you.

originalText.text: I found Dr. Ng through my Insurance carrier and some online research. I decided that I wanted Dr. Ng to be my OB for my pregnancy and am glad I chose her. I read reviews from other expectant mothers and patients she had prior all stating  she is knowledgeable and kind. I feel so unbelievably comfortable with her. She has been great. I am 5 months along and look forward to the rest of my pregnancy with Dr. Ng.

originalText.text: She is the BEST, very caring, responsive and with POSITIVE attitude, highly highly recommended,
